title: Platinum Support main looking for ranked team!
body:
I can play mid (Anivia) or Top (GP) and I am maybe silver/low Gold level adc but I main support main 
Champion pool;

* Janna
* Nami
* Sona
* Karma
* Lulu
* I played blitz when I was low gold and it went pretty well

Add me in game **You Will Miss** if you want me in your ranked team :D
If not, I hope to verus you on the rift :P (preferably win)!

replies.body: Hey I used to be gold in season 3 im adc main and I've got a good Jgl mid and top already looking for a support msg me if you want to join XD
